Comments_List: Understanding of statistics and applying them to datasets; data cleaning and reporting; coming up with test statistics and significance levels.

ability to understand data, handling data, and work with different techniques of data anlytics. The class was very helpful and infomative. I learned a lot about coding and dealing with real life research questions.
Developed statistical knowledge needed to solve practical problems.
More guidance on what tests to use and why to use those ones; peer review of reports
strengths: we are free to choose different approaches

The course was very small in size compared to other classes which enabled design of the courses to be very intimate and connected. We worked as teams and individuals in order to enhance our skills in data analytics. I really enjoyed the format of presentations because it allows students to be engaged and understand works of others. facilitates learning.
Could strengthen the ability to deal with real-world data and develop practical statistical knowledge.
Its good for people interested in Statistics, but note that its not Data Science and definitely leverages a large body of prerequisite knowledge.

this is a really great course for any students who are interested in data analytics and understanding data. however, there are some learning curve. If one is not familiar with R or programming it could be a difficult course. However, this course provide incredible amount of benefit and I would recommend it.
